markdown:
| icon           = poe2 jasper icon.png
| description    = Jade is a dense stone more commonly found in the Deadfire than in the Old Empires or Eastern Reach. Some tribes use jade for small knives and fishhooks, but it is far more frequently used for buttons, beads, and other decorative arts. Marbled white and light green jade are the most common colors, but jade can also be found in black, red, blue, and dark green varieties.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
